snippet: Anfernee Hardaway and Chris Rock, the duo behind Nike's Lil' Penny ads in the 1990s, will reunite this week on a radio show to discuss the character and its influence.
abstract: Anfernee Hardaway and Chris Rock, the duo behind Nike's Lil' Penny ads in the 1990s, will reunite this week on a radio show to discuss the character and its influence.

headline.main: Hardaway and Rock in a Lil' Penny Reunion
